An interception context.
Docs.summary: Checks whether the supplied interception context contains the target context or the supplied connection is the same as the one used by the target context.
Docs.returns: true if the supplied interception context contains the target context or the supplied connection is the same as the one used by the target context if the supplied interception context doesn't contain any contexts; false otherwise.
